PrecisAuthority for the President of the Queen's Privy Council for Canada to make ex gratia payments which will offset some of the legal fees incurred by the survivors and the families of victims who appeared before the Commission of Inquiry into the Air Ontario Crash at Dryden, Ontario, as recommended by the Commissioner, the Hon. Mr. Justice Virgil P. Moshansky.
